title: Does an M.Com from IGNOU have any value? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no denying that a regular degree is always better than a distance one. If you want to pursue Mcom for serious academic purpose, it is better to do it from a regular university. But if you are a working professional and don't have time to attend college then go for a distance degree. As far as recognition is concerned, IGNOU degrees are UGC approved and are recognized for all purposes including government jobs. But there are certain jobs which specifically require the applicants to obtain degrees from a regular universities.

A Post-Graduation (PG) from IGNOU is a reputed form of distance education, but it is generally pursued by working class people, who work in pvt. scetors, a pursue courses from IGNOU or any other distance learning platform for a better promotional opportunity. It'll be good to go if u just wanna add “a feather to ur cap”. Means, it's good only if u want to add an additional qualification to ur name. Don't expect too much from it, as u'll not get any kind of placement and the degree will not be accepted in any govt. organisation as it's a distance course. Let me tell u it's advantages and disadvantages. Advantages : 1. Something is better than nothing. It means, atleast just being a graduate, it's better to have a PG either it's from a distance or regular course. 2. It'll be helpful for u if u r working or will work in any private organisation. Disadvantages : The PG from a distance course is not recognised as valid by govt. institutions.It'll give u no benefits if u r working or willing to work in any govt. organisation.A distance course from IGNOU has the same value, as it is from any other Open University or Distance Learning Institution like Sikkim Manipal University or any other. My suggestion for u : If u r a student, and if u have enough time to continue ur studies, I'll suggest u to do ur PG in a regular course. All the best.

According to me it is more than good from sol (school of open learnung) SOL has a yearly based exam but IGNOU organises it twice in a year. If you get back in any subject then you can take your exam after 6 months. You will not have to wait for a year like sol.Ignou has assignment system. By assignment, you get a good idea about exams and questions also.In ignou you can get your results in 3 months.If you are a student you can do easily any degree program from IGNOU.If you are a worker then it's little hard for you because of assignment.

The syllabus offered is quite comprehensive for M.Com. If you are doing it parallely with some other course, this is the best option available. Go for it. And as you know it that IGNOU is a central university established by Act of Parliament. IGNOU Degrees/Diplomas/Certificates are recognized by all the members of the Association of the Indian Universities (AIU) and AICTE and are at par with Degrees/Diplomas /Certificates of all the Indian Universities/Deemed Universities/Institutions. Could you just spare a minute to support my new YouTube channel, will appreciate a lot 🙏 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClQHhx86yFFglvykR56Vqmg

Hi Dear, There is nothing good or bad in perusing any degree,it depends all on your interest for a subject to further study them for your future base.Secondly M.Com is a great option to study from IGNOU if you are from a commerce background & its not very difficulty to clear the exams.Just focus on the core you will succeed. Hence first decide on your own and than only opt for any subject for your masters degree. God bless you!!

It depends whether you're Pursuing it distance learning or Regular. if Distance apart from Degree you'll not get any benefit because distance education doesn't make that much difference whether in your life or Cv better attend some good regular college and learn something.
Yes, m. Com from ignou have equal value to other universities. My graduation completed from ignou and now I am Pg student in Bhu.
yes, it is valuable cuz it offers http://M.COM in regular commerce subject as well other recents fields like INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS OPERATIONS .

Nice bcz compare to the other university they don't have any assignment policies and it's affect your final passing percentage bcz of assignments & others like viva but in ignou is compulsory to make assignment to increase your grades as well as knowledge So you should be admitted to ignou.
